title: Pizza
description: A great supper dish or for Saturday lunch when you have a bit more time on your hands.
ingredients: 2 x 793g/1lb 12oz cans plum tomatoes,strained or 1.4kg/3lb fresh plum tomatoes, skinned, seeded and chopped roughly
5 slices of mozzarella cheese, cut in rounds
1 small clove garlic, peeled and chopped roughly
